about_the_game:
"Waifu Fighter: Digital Art Book

Includes character visuals, backgrounds, and stickers from the game. Plus, you'll get a chance to see original design sketches for the characters! All these images from those bloodthirsty battles and bawdy bonings will bring you right back into the heat of it!

72-page art book with the following content:

- Full character introductions
- Character visuals for every article of clothing removed
- Clothes removal and sex scene 插圖、差分
- Snippets from the best dialogues
- Original character designs
- Background designs
- Cover design process
- 2 Versions: Chinese & English (Bilingual), Japanese & English (Bilingual)
"

content_descriptors.notes: It contains female nudity and pornographic content, mild violence and other adult content. Please pay attention to it and make sure you are in a suitable place before watching, so as not to cause trouble for others.
